author: cms-sw
body: For ppc64le gcc11 builds, gcc properly use host triple to `powerpc64le-redhat-linux-gnu` which llvm uses `powerpc64le-unknown-linux-gnu` which causes cmssw build to fail as llvm could not find gcc headers. This change should make sure that same host tripel is used by llvm and gcc
title: [llvm] use same host triple as set by gcc
